purpose: Facilitates the creation and management of durable AI agents with a focus on orchestration and reactivity
principle: Built on a reactive runtime architecture, enabling dynamic orchestration and coordination of AI agents
reusability: Offers a modular framework for integrating various AI models and supports extension through plugins and APIs
limitations: In alpha stage, may have stability issues and limited documentation; primarily suitable for developers familiar with Rust
name: chidori
description: A reactive runtime for building durable AI agents
highlight: Reactive runtime designed for building durable AI agents with orchestration capabilities
